data[1:] = [heading, None] # For heading entries # data[1:] = [None, helpText] # For help entries "default+headings": [ # data[1:] = [helpText] 53, # itemHeight [ MultiContentEntryText(pos=(0, 0), size=(900, 48), font=0, text=1), MultiContentEntryText(pos=(30, 0), size=(870, 42), font=1, text=2), ] ], # Template for use when "description" is used # "templates": { # # Simple help with no headings ("flat") # # data[1:] = [helpText] # "default": [ # 57, # itemHeight # [ # MultiContentEntryText(pos=(0, 0), size=(900, 42), font=1, text=1), # ] # ], # # Simple help with headings # # data[1:] = [heading, None] # For heading entries # # data[1:] = [None, helpText] # For help entries # "default+headings": [ # 38, # itemHeight # [ # MultiContentEntryText(pos=(0, 0), size=(900, 48), font=0, text=1), # MultiContentEntryText(pos=(30, 0), size=(870, 42), font=1, text=2), # ] # ], # # Extended help with no headings # # data[1:] = [helpText, extendedHelpText] # "extended": [ # 38, # itemHeight # [ # MultiContentEntryText(pos=(0, 0), size=(900, 42), font=1, text=1), # ] # ], # # Extended help with headings # # data[1:] = [heading, None, None] # For heading entries # # data[1:] = [None, helpText, extendedHelpText] # For help entries # "extended+headings": [ # 57, # itemHeight # [ # MultiContentEntryText(pos=(0, 0), size=(900, 48), font=0, text=1), # MultiContentEntryText(pos=(30, 0), size=(870, 42), font=1, text=2), # ] # ], # }, # "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 42), gFont("Regular", 36), gFont("Regular", 27)], # "itemHeight": 57 #} # Compact template for use when "description" is used #{ "templates": dict( # list(dict.fromkeys(("default", "extended"), [ # 57, # itemHeight # [ # MultiContentEntryText(pos=(0, 0), size=(900, 42), font=1, text=1), # ] # ]).items()) + # list(dict.fromkeys(("default+headings", "extended+headings"), [ # 57, # itemHeight # [ # MultiContentEntryText(pos=(0, 0), size=(900, 48), font=0, text=1), # MultiContentEntryText(pos=(30, 0), size=(870, 42), font=1, text=2), # ] # ]).items()) # ), # "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 42), gFont("Regular", 36), gFont("Regular", 27)], # "itemHeight": 57 #}

screen.name: MessageBoxTemplate
screen.applet: from enigma import eSize, ePoint titleheight = 30 #if self.timerRunning: # titleheight = 30 #else: # titleheight = 0 # self.setTitle("") orgwidth = self.instance.size().width() orgheight = self.instance.size().height() orgpos = self.instance.position() textsize = self["text"].getSize() textsize = (textsize[0] + 75, textsize[1] + 30) wsizex = textsize[0] + 90 wsizey = textsize[1] itemHeight = 38 lenlist = len(self.list) * itemHeight if (lenlist > 188): lenlist = 188 if (96 > wsizey): wsizey = 96 if self.type == self.TYPE_YESNO: wsizey += lenlist + 15 if (420 > wsizex): wsizex = 420 wsize = (wsizex, wsizey + titleheight) self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize)) self["text"].instance.move(ePoint(96, int(12 + titleheight))) self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize)) self["ErrorPixmap"].instance.move(ePoint(6, int(6 + titleheight))) self["ErrorPixmap"].instance.resize(eSize(80,80)) self["QuestionPixmap"].instance.move(ePoint(6, int(6 + titleheight))) self["QuestionPixmap"].instance.resize(eSize(80,80)) self["InfoPixmap"].instance.move(ePoint(6, int(6 + titleheight))) self["InfoPixmap"].instance.resize(eSize(80,80)) if self.type == self.TYPE_YESNO: listsize = (wsizex-6, lenlist) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(3, int(wsizey - lenlist + titleheight - 3))) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize)) newwidth = wsize[0] self.instance.move(ePoint(int(orgpos.x() + (orgwidth - newwidth) // 2), int(orgpos.y() + (orgheight - wsizey) // 2)))
